name: Proof_356 — Village Food Purchase After 3 km Walk MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a daily subsistence activity at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
19 December 2025 at 09:26 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee returning from a local village shop carrying food supplies, including fresh fish and household provisions. The round trip distance is approximately 3 kilometers, completed on foot.

This activity reflects real-world labor conditions where food access requires physical movement rather than digital ordering or motorized transport. Such routines form a critical part of daily survival logistics in small-scale rural life.

Within the DGCP framework, daily movement, energy expenditure, and food acquisition are treated as valid ground-truth data points. This proof records not only the items obtained, but the human effort required to sustain the household and farm ecosystem.

The image is captured as-is, without staging or reenactment. The embedded timestamp provides verifiable temporal anchoring and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s real-work data archive.

This proof is part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection and is distributed via IPFS (ipfs.io) to ensure immutable reference, auditability, and long-term preservation.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
